changeYourEmail:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for the email change form section.
**UI Location**: Settings → Email (page heading).
**When Users See This**: When viewing the email settings section.
**Technical Context**: Standard text.
**Current English**: "Change your email"
yourEmailAddress:
**Functional Purpose**: Label for the email address input field.
**UI Location**: Settings → Email → Your email address (label).
**When Users See This**: When viewing the email settings section.
**Technical Context**: Standard text.
**Current English**: "Your email address"
confirmYourPassword:
**Functional Purpose**: Label for the password confirmation input field.
**UI Location**: Settings → Email → Confirm your password (label).
**When Users See This**: When viewing the email settings section.
**Technical Context**: Standard text.
**Current English**: "Confirm your password"
info.changeEmailConfirmation:
**Functional Purpose**: Informative message regarding the email change process.
**UI Location**: Settings → Email (below password field).
**When Users See This**: When viewing the email settings section.
**Technical Context**: Standard informational text.
**Current English**: "You can change your email using the form above. We will send you a new confirmation email for you to accept."
changeEmail:
**Functional Purpose**: Button text to submit the email change form.
**UI Location**: Settings → Email (submit button).
**When Users See This**: After filling out the email change form.
**Technical Context**: Standard button text.
**Current English**: "Change email"
success.confirmationEmailSent:
**Functional Purpose**: Success message displayed after an email change request is submitted.
**UI Location**: Settings → Email (success message after submission).
**When Users See This**: Immediately after successfully submitting a request to change the email address.
**Technical Context**: Contains a variable `%{email}` that must remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "We've sent a confirmation email to %{email}"
themePreferenceForm.theme:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for the theme preference section.
**UI Location**: Settings → Theme Preference (page heading).
**When Users See This**: When viewing the theme preference settings.
**Technical Context**: Standard text.
**Current English**: "Theme"
